software.aizynthcli: A command-line tool for retrosynthetic analysis and synthesis planning
software.slurm: A workload manager for high-performance computing systems

input.smiles_csv: A CSV file containing SMILES strings of molecules
input.config: A YAML configuration file for the aizynthcli tool
input.stocks: A string specifying the source of building blocks (e.g., 'zinc' for Zinc database)
input.policy: A string specifying the patent policy (e.g., 'uspto' for USPTO patents)

output.output: An HDF file containing the results of the retrosynthetic analysis
